body:
Hello Avicanucks,

Now that we are at the figurative eve of Avicus' long-prophesied death, I have something important to confess to you all: I have only been pretending to be retarded this entire time. Yes, that is correct. I tricked you. You have been deceived. It was all a ruse. I have never been mentally retarded, nor do I plan on being so barring any sort of unfortunate accident. You may be wondering at this point, why did I do all of this? What was my grand design, my end goal with such an insidious plan? I did it because it was funny to me. Haha.

This is also an AMA. To answer your question, roll a six-sided dice and consult the table below:

1 - You're a homo-sexual.
2 - It was the International Jewish Conspiracy (IJC).
3 - Go directly to jail.
4 - Yes, many times in fact. Not all in a row though, that would be crazy.
5 - Hell no
6 - See 5, but with an extra "hell" in front.
7 - I said a six-sided dice, dumbass. Why do you even have a dice with more than six sides, you fucking nerd.

title: My confession.

replies.body: Did you have sexual affairs with that woman?
replies.body_tagged: Did you have sexual affairs with that woman?
